item.title: Partnership with Organic Mandya
item.description: Our focus at Rainmatter foundation is to help create green jobs, livelihoods & help preserve the environment using sustainable agri practices. In that journey, we’re super delighted to join Madhu Chandan & Organic Mandya on their mission to change farming & improve lives of farmers. Organic Mandya has helped create kitchen gardens with fruit tree saplings in 5,000+ homes. Through Sunday Santhes in Mandya, they’re creating direct farmer to consumer relationships.
